title: I need help RIOT!! PLEASEE!
body: Hello guys about 3 years ago, because my acc got hacked a friend of mine from another country gave me his account without changing the email to mine, he has stopped playing League since then, today someones is repeatedly trying to get on my account, can you please help me change the email to mine so i can change the password, i spent money and time on this account, I AM REALLY AFRAID OF LOOSING IT!! PLEASE HELP ME IT HAS JUST HAPPENED AGAIN!!

replies.body: Our account team will only return the account to the original owner.  It sucks to be the bearer of bad news here, but we don't support account gifting or trading so I don't think there's much we can do,  Contact us through an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) and we see if there are any options to help.  We'll reply back as soon as we can!
